data.title: Reader Service
data.text:
Harlequin Reader Service subscriptions give you the power to choose your own literary experience. Pick the best fiction books from some of the most popular genres and categories, including:

Amish romance

Contemporary romance

Cozy mystery

Historical romance

Inspirational romance

Medical romance

Romantic comedy

Romantic suspense

Suspense

Pick one of our romance collections to read the best love stories and indulge in your favorite tropes from enemies to lovers, forced proximity, fake dating, secret baby, marriage of convenience, sunny and grumpy, second chance romances, soulmates, holiday romance, and more!

No more waiting for new releases or tracking down books one at a time. With Harlequin Reader Service, you can easily enjoy the newest released books, with the convenience of having them delivered directly to your preferred reading device as ebooks or to your door as print books.

These books will be delivered to you at least a month before they're available at retail. You'll be the first to get your hands on the hottest new reads before everyone in your book club or bookish-friend circle.

Select a Welcome Collection and unlock a gateway to books that will transport you to extraordinary places, introduce you to unforgettable love stories, and acquaint you with remarkable heroes and heroines.

Choose your favorites, lose yourself in their pages, and experience the joy of uninterrupted reading.
